name: Legend of Zelda Dashboard Theme
description: Dashboard theme for toon Link (although he can be easily removed if desired).

user.about: I am an amateur at CSS, but I enjoy design and using cool color combinations especially! Hopefully my themes meet with your approval. And of course, if you have any questions or complaints, please don't hesitate to contact me! :> You can find my blog here.
